pages.title: Welcome to your new Mac!
pages.body: The Trenton Public Schools Technology Department has been hard at work over the last few months preparing a new and more improved Mac experience for staff. We are proud to show off what we have been working on and are excited to see what you think.

pages.title: Staff MacBook/iPad Loan Agreement
pages.body: Please ensure that you are familiar with the Trenton Public Schools agreement: https://tinyurl.com/TPSStaffAUP25
